title: Drawing, "Design for a Cup", 1936
medium: Pen and black, brown ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower center: COUPE, lower right: J.P./36/(square root sign) 2.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Cylindrical cup flaring at the top drawn in plan and elevation. The cup supported on two inverted saucer-shaped bases indicated in brown ink separated by a wide silver band and flanked by an applied band grooved on the outer edge conforming to the contour of the base. Underdrawing in graphite of cup in golden section.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Cup", 1936.
1936. Pen and black, brown ink, graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-17.
